content: g j k @ 2024 willow&wild all rights reserved bulba the seed toad 6 of 6 assembly l m sew the arms to round 2 of the body on either side photo l sew the ears onto either side of the head the top of the ear side without the round 2 increases is sewn onto round 3 of the head photo m n seed bulb in malachite mark 14 stitches in a circle centred on the back photo n you will be working in the marked stitches only starting along the bottom 1 half_double_crochet increase x 14 28 photo o 2 half_double_crochet 5 half_double_crochet decrease x 4 24 3 half_double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet decrease x 8 16 4 half_double_crochet decrease x 8 8 5 half_double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet decrease x 2 6 6 half_double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet decrease x 2 4 fasten_off and weave in tail the same way as the head photo p o p @ 2024 willow&wild all rights reserved
